entries.help_list: This is the list of players that are allowed to perform the action.  A particular object may have many of these lists, each one for a particular action (i.e. permission to enter a building, permission to administer the building, etc.).
entries.help_add: Click this button to add a new player to the list.  Nearby people will be added to the combo box for easy selection, but any player can be added.
entries.help_remove: Click this button to remove the selected player from the list, revoking their right to perform the given action.
